articles.title: Fortnite maker Epic Games is laying off 16% of its workforce - TechCrunch
articles.description: Epic Games is laying off 16% percent of its employees, impacting about 870 people, the company announced on Thursday.
articles.content: Epic Games is laying off 16% percent of its employees, impacting about 870 people, the Fortnite maker announced on Thursday. The company also announced that it’s divesting Bandcamp, an online audio d… [+2918 chars]

articles.author: Keith Cooper
articles.title: Radio telescope will launch to moon's far side in 2025 to hunt for the cosmic Dark Ages - Space.com
articles.description: The radio astronomy experiment LuSEE-Night will test technologies for radio telescopes on the far side of the moon.
articles.content:
A small mission to test technology to detect radio waves from the cosmic Dark Ages over 13.4 billion years ago will blast off for the far side of the moon in 2025.
